author: The Real R.S.
title: The Real R.S.
text:
After a lot of purchases from Banggood, I run into a bad one finally. If you are buying a lot, this comes time to time. It does not matter where you buy, statistically taken, it must happen. But the reactions of various sellers do vary a lot.
Well, this was my very first test of Banggood's customer care. How will they react and deal with my issue? I was expecting anything but this. I thought I will hear usual excuses like "ok, it is not as nice, it is damaged but still quite usable" and so on. But NO!
What to say ... it was unbelievably easy and fast. I had made a complaint and included two photos of my issue. I received an apology and full money refund on the second day. NO QUESTIONS ASKED!
I was afraid I am going to make a bad experience but exactly the opposite was the case. I am very happy that I can trust Banggoods and continue shopping there with confidence.
